price: How will it be when We bring a witness from every community, and bring you [O Prophet] as a witness against these [people]?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا جِئۡنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةِۭ بِشَهِيدٖ وَجِئۡنَا بِكَ عَلَىٰ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
